ComicInfo.Title: Homefront, Part 4 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary: HOMEFRONT! DOC has only precious minutes to save a teammate's life as the forces of COBRA close in-and her injuries prevent her from performing the operation herself. Is another G.I. JOE member ready for a crash course in battlefield surgery? Plus: Can ROADBLOCK & Co. convince the people of Warrenton to turn against COBRA? All this and the return of SCRAP IRON! WHO DOESN'T LOVE SCRAP IRON?!!?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 13:27:55. [CVDB406998]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Allen Martinez, Juan Doe, Kito Young, Ryan Dunlavey, Steve Kurth
ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness, COBRA Viper, Cover Girl, Croc Master, Destro, Doc, Dr. Mindbender, Duke, Hashtag, Quick-Kick, Roadblock, Scrap-Iron, Shipwreck, Tunnel Rat, Wild Bill
